GSP28prakp11u:12: na vidanti ye samagraṃ kṛpayā tadanugrahaḥ kriyate // 1 // 1071//
GSP28prakp11u:13: tatra kāryavākyārthavādina eva bhāvam, bhāvanām, apūrvañca vākyārthān pratijānate /
GSP28prakp11u:15: tasya mūlaṃ padānāmanvitābhidhāyeteti, tāmeva tāvadādau pariśodhayati /
GSP28prakp11u:18: 1074 ye ca padairananvitāḥ padārthā abhihitāḥ padārthā abhihitāḥ parasparānvayamātmano 'vagamayanti---iti /
GSP28prakp11u:22: padebhya eva, na vākyāt, nāpyantyavarṇāt, nāpi padārthebhya ityarthaḥ // 1 //
GSP28prakp11u:26: vākyārthapratipattau hi padānāmanupāyatve tadanyathānupapattyā, vākyamekaṃ tadupāyabhūtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP28prakp11u:28: yadyapi cā'nantyādvākyānām, tadarthānāñca, vaidikasya cār'thasyānanyopāyatvāt vyutpattiraśakyā /
GSP28prakp11u:34: yadi vā padaissukaravyutpattayo 'nanvitā eva svārthā abhihitā vākyārthamavabodhayantītyaṅgīkriyata,
GSP28prakp11u:40: nanu teṣāṃ bhūyastvād bhūyāṃso vākyārthāḥ, vākyāni ca syurityatrā'ha---
GSP28prakp11u:41: bhūyāṃso yadyapi svārthāḥ padānāṃ te pṛthakpṛthak /
GSP28prakp11u:47: tadeva kathannāma viśiṣṭaṃ pratīyatāmityevamarthaṃ guṇānāṃ pratipādanam,
GSP28prakp11u:53: ata eva ca “1076ṣaṣṭhādye na padaṃ nāma kiñcana vākye,
GSP28prakp11u:54: na padārthā nāma kecana vākyārthe” [bṛ. ṭī. 6-1-1] ityuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:55: pṛthagbhūtaṃ padaṃ nāma na kiñcana pramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp11u:58: samprati vākyameva vācakaṃ vākyārthasyeti ye bruvate, 1077ye ca vākyāntyavarṇa eveti /
GSP28prakp11u:62: yadyapi vṛddhavyavahārapūrvikaiva sarvā śabdavyutpattiḥ, vākyaireva ca vyavahāraḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:66: na ca tathā sati vākyārthapratipattirnopapadyate, vakṣyamāṇatvānnyāyasya /
GSP28prakp11u:77: padavādinastu, saptānāṃ padānāṃ saptaiva śaktaya iti kalpanālāghavam /
GSP28prakp11u:78: anayaiva diśā śuklāmiti padaprekṣepe vākyavādino 'ṣṭāvaparāḥ kalpyāḥ, 1079padavādinastvekaiva /
GSP28prakp11u:81: tanmate 'pi tāvat padārthavibhāgasya pāramārthikatvāt ghaṭetaiva vyutpattiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:83: na ca vākyāntyavarṇavācakatvavādināṃ padaṃ padārthasya vācakam /
GSP28prakp11u:94: 1083bhāṣyakāravacanañca “pūrvavarṇanitasaṃskārasahito 'ntyo varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ” [śā. bhā. pṛ. 46] iti nirviṣayam /
GSP28prakp11u:97: atra keciccodayanti---nanu vṛddhavyavahāraprayukte vākye padānāṃ vācakaśaktyavadhāraṇameva nopapadyate /
GSP28prakp11u:100: tasya va jñānasya jñeyāvyabhicāritvāt jñeyabhūtārthaniścaya iti, na vācakaśaktyavagamaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:103: parihṛtaṃ hi tatredam---bālo hi vyutpadyamānaḥ prayojyavṛddhasya śabdaśravaṇasamanantarabhāvinīṃ viśiṣṭaceṣṭānumitāmarthapratītiṃ śabdakāraṇikāmavagacchati /
GSP28prakp11u:105: tathopalabhamānasya caiva vimārśo jāyate---sambhāvyamānānanvitārthapadaracanamidaṃ vākyaṃ kathaṃ prayojyavṛddhasya arthaniścayaṃ kṛtavat ?
GSP28prakp11u:137: te ca tathābhūtāḥ padairabhihitāḥ padārthā ākāṅkṣā-sannidhi-yogyatāvanto vākyārthamavagamayanti /
GSP28prakp11u:155: padārthapratipādanañca vākyārthapratipattaye prayuktānāṃ padānāmavāntaravyāpāra iti ca,
GSP28prakp11u:168: saukāryādākāṅkṣitena yogyena sannihitena cānvitaṃ svārthaṃ padaṃ vaktīti vyutpattirāśrīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:176: kriyā hi kārakāvinābhāvinīti tāṃ pratītya, kārakaṃ jijñāsate, evaṃ kārakamapi budhvā, kriyāmiti /
GSP28prakp11u:181: tarhi kriyāmātrāvagame 'pi yatra kārakajñānena prayojanaṃ nāsti,
GSP28prakp11u:183: anuṣṭheya tayā hi kriyāyāmavagatāyāṃ kārakamantareṇa tadanuṣṭhānānupapatteḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:185: vartamānāpadeśādau tvananuṣṭheyatayā nāsti na kārakajñānena prayojanam /
GSP28prakp11u:186: atha ca yatrāpi vākyamaparipūrṇaṃ manyante, sākāṅkṣārthābhidhāyitayā cāparipūrṇatā /
GSP28prakp11u:193: tataśca anākāṅkṣitatvāt tasya, tadanvayo na syādvākyārthe /
GSP28prakp11u:196: evama “pyaruṇayaikahāyanyā piṅgākṣyā somaṃ krīṇātī” [tai. saṃ. 6.1.9] tyatrāpyananvayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:197: na hi vedapadoccāraṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyamiti kiñcana pramāṇamasti,
GSP28prakp11u:202: ajñāte hi jñānecchā ghaṭate, na punarjñāte 'pi /
GSP28prakp11u:206: na hyanuccarite pratiyogisannidhāpake1106 pade 'nvitābhidhānaṃ śakyate vaktum /
GSP28prakp11u:223: tatparityāgena kāmye niyojyaviśeṣaṇe sthite sarvakāmipuruṣavyāpisvargasyaiva niyojyaviśeṣaṇatvayogyatvāt,
GSP28prakp11u:227: alaukikatvādeva ca “sauryaṃ caruṃ1115 nirvapet ghṛte śuklānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ brahmavarcasakāmaḥ” [mai. saṃ. 2. 2. 2] ityādau karaṇopakāramanteraṇa vidhessiddhyasambhavāt tajjijñāsā,
GSP28prakp11u:229: ata eva tadabhāve bhāṣyakāro vākyānāṃ 1116nyūnatāmāśaṅkya parihṛtavān1117 /
GSP28prakp11u:230: nanvevaṃ tarhi tatra padatrayaṃ prayujyate---“gāmānaya śuklāmi“ti loke,
GSP28prakp11u:252: kasmātpunaranayoḥ putra-puruṣa-yossannidhi-yogyatvāviśeṣe 'pi putreṇaiva rājñassambandhaḥ, na puruṣeṇa /
GSP28prakp11u:259: sā ceyamākāṅkṣā pratiyogiṣu sarveṣu na sahasaivopajāyate, kintu kāraṇopanipātakrameṇa /
GSP28prakp11u:260: tathāhi---viṣayamantareṇāpūrvaṃ kāryaṃ pratyetumeva na śakyata iti,
GSP28prakp11u:262: atha pratipanne viṣayasambandhini vidhyarthe, niyojyamantareṇa tatsiddhyasambhavānniyojyākāṅkṣā /
GSP28prakp11u:278: sā ca na śabdanibandhanaiva kevalamanvitābhidhānavyutpattāvupalakṣaṇam 1126 adhyāhṛtenāpi loke anvitābhidhānadarśanāt /
GSP28prakp11u:279: na ca vācyaṃ---śabda evādhyāhviyate, sacār'thamupasthāpayati---iti, anupayogāt, apramāṇakatvācca /
GSP28prakp11u:285: savikalpakajñānānāñca śabdapurassaratvāt purovartiti śabda eva paryavasyati---iti /
GSP28prakp11u:290: śrutārthāpattavapi tatraiva tasyāḥ prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam, na śabde /
GSP28prakp11u:292: kiñca sarvatra savikalpakajñāne śabdassmaraṇaviparivartī na prameyatāṃ pratipattumarhati /
GSP28prakp11u:293: savikalpakalpakajñāneṣu pūrvapratīyamānatā ca śabdasya nātīva pramāṇavatī,
GSP28prakp11u:296: na ca śabdānupapattyā śabdakalpanaivocitā, tasya svāte 'nupapattyabhāvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:306: prakaraṇādivaśena ca viśeṣāvadhāraṇādartha eva ca paripūraka iti,
GSP28prakp11u:325: nanvevaṃ tarhi kathamapūrve kārye 'nvitābhidhānaṃ vede, tena saha kasya cit sambandhasyādarśanāt /
GSP28prakp11u:327: yadapi tadapūrvam, tadapi kāryameveti dṛṣṭacarakāryasambandhaṃ yat, tadyogyamityavasīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:335: yathāpramāṇāntarāvedye vastani kasyacid yogyatāvadhārayituṃ na śakyate,
GSP28prakp11u:339: anupādeyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasyaiva svargakāmādeḥ niyojyatayānvaya iti niyamo nopapadyata ityalamatiprasaṅgena // 8 //
GSP28prakp11u:345: etadeva kathamiti paryanuyuktena vṛddhavyavahāre tathādarśanāditi parihāro vācyaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:351: padārthānāṃ hi śabdādanyataḥ pramāṇāt pratīyamānānāmanyonyānvayabodhakatvaṃ na pratītamiti,
GSP28prakp11u:354: śabdo hi viśiṣṭārthapratipattiparatayā lokavyavahāreṣu prayujyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:355: na co 'sau sākṣādvākyārthapratipādane samartha iti, padārthānavāntaravyāpārīkaroti /
GSP28prakp11u:360: syādevam---yadi mānāntarāvaseyānāṃ padārthānāmanyonyānvayāvagame sāmarthyaṃ na syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:375: sa hyevaṃ pratipadyate---bhavitavyamasmin deśe nūnamaśvena, bhavitavyañca kenaciddhāvateti /
GSP28prakp11u:385: tasyāpyaśvatve vegavati ca gamane śvetavartinyevānumānam, na svatantrayoḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:388: tadā kasmin pramāṇe tasyāntarbhāva iti vācyam ?
GSP28prakp11u:406: anupāyatve padānāmanvayapratītau padārthā api cenna kāraṇam, akāraṇikaivā /
GSP28prakp11u:418: yathā prakṛtyarthe pūrvapratīte pratyaya uccāryamāṇassvarthaṃ tadviśiṣṭamevābhidhatte,
GSP28prakp11u:420: taduktaṃ, “prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ” [ma. bhā.] iti /
GSP28prakp11u:426: aṅgīkṛtaṃ tarhi dvitīyasya padasyānvitābhidhānam, prathamasya tathāpi nāstīti cenna /
GSP28prakp11u:428: yadeva kadācit prathamam, tadeva kadācit dvitīyamiti, sarvapadānāmevānvitābhidhānamāpatitam /
GSP28prakp11u:434: pākayuktaḥ punaḥ kartā vācyo naikasya kasyacid” // 1143//
GSP28prakp11u:451: sarvatra ca sambandhini dṛṣṭe, sambandhyantare buddhirbhavatīti kḷptameva /
GSP28prakp11u:458: lakṣaṇīyavaśena hi kvacit svārthasya tyāgaḥ, saṃgraho vā /
GSP28prakp11u:462: tathā “paurṇamāsīṃ yajate” ityekavacanānupapattyā paurṇamāsīśabdo yāgavacano yāgasamudāyalakṣaṇārthaḥ1147 /
GSP28prakp11u:466: tathā niṣādasthapatyadhikaraṇa [mī. da. 6. 1-10] pūrvapakṣe ṣaṣṭhyarthalakṣaṇā syādityucyate,
GSP28prakp11u:470: na ca guṇinoragnīṣomayostatra hānamiti, 1150svārthāparityāge 'pi yuktaiva lakṣaṇā /
GSP28prakp11u:485: atha mā bhūdeṣā lakṣaṇā, kinatu kriyāvagata kārakānvayinīmātmano daśāmavagamayati, avinābhāvāditi /
GSP28prakp11u:489: atha viśeṣānvayaṃ vinā vyavahārānavakalpanādanarthakaṃ śabdoccāraṇamiti tadāśrayaṇam,
GSP28prakp11u:491: vede tvānarthakyena na bhavitavyamiti, pramāṇābhāvānna śakyate viśeṣānvayo 'vagantum /
GSP28prakp11u:492: na ca loke 'pyānarthakyamāpadyata ityetāvatā kāraṇenopāyādvināpi viśeṣānvayādhyavasānaṃ yuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:498: tanna tatra vṛddhavyavahāra eva tatparatā padānām,
GSP28prakp11u:499: padārthānāṃ vā upāyābhāvena kathaṃ nāma nirvahati ?
GSP28prakp11u:500: me cintā sā hi padānām, padārthānāṃ vā śaktikalpanāṃ vinānupapanneti manyāmahe // 10 //
GSP28prakp11u:506: tena teṣāmabhidhānaśaktissampratipannaiveti, tasyā evānvayaparyantatayā kalpayituṃ sukarā /
GSP28prakp11u:521: [ślo. vā. adhi. 7. ślo. 248] iti cā'cāryavacanadarśanāt smārakatāmeva padānāmabhidhāyakatvamāha, taṃ pratyāha---
GSP28prakp11u:527: tena padārtheṣu padānāṃ smārakatvātiriktaṃ ye 'bhidhāyakatvamāhuḥ, teṣāṃ śaktitrayakalpanā /
GSP28prakp11u:542: sa padaṃ śrutvā nūnaṃ tāvadidaṃ smarati---idamasyākāṅkṣita-sannihita-yogya-pratiyogyanvitasya vācakamiti /
GSP28prakp11u:545: abhihitānvayavādino 'pi yāvat padāntaramarthāntaraṃ nopasthāpayati, tāvadanvayāvagamo nāsti /
GSP28prakp11u:553: ata eva tatrabhavata ācāryasya vākyalakṣaṇaṃ “saṃhatyār'thamabhidadhati padāni vākyami” [śā. bhā. balā. a. pa. 824.] ti /
GSP28prakp11u:555: śrūyamāṇena hi padena yor'tho nāvabodhitaḥ, sa kathamantarhite tasminnavabhāseta /
GSP28prakp11u:556: ucyate---abhihitānvayavādino 'pi nāyaṃ niyamaḥ---śrūyamāṇa eva pūrvapūrvavarṇajanitasaṃskārasahito 'ntyo varṇaḥ padārthapratipādaka iti,
GSP28prakp11u:559: śrūyamāṇena hi padena pratiyogisāpekṣatvādanvitābhidhānasya prāk sahakārivirahādartho nābhihitaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:562: itarāṇi ca padāni pratiyogisannidhāpanamātra eva vyāpriyantām /
GSP28prakp11u:563: na cāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā, prāthamyena, pradhānapadatvena vā viśeṣagrahaṇāt /
GSP28prakp11u:565: “padamādyaṃ1168 vā vākyam, pradhānaṃ padaṃ vā vākyami” [vā. pa. kā. 2. ślo. 2.] ti /
GSP28prakp11u:567: prathamasyaiva syādvākyatā yadi, sarvapadārthānāṃ prathamapadārthānvitatā syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:573: tathā pradhānapadasyāpi vākyatvamayuktam, somapadārthena1170 saha sarveṣāmananvayāt /
GSP28prakp11u:575: tathāpyasmin vākye kraya evā'ruṇyādīnāmaidamarthyena, kriyā-kārakabhāvena cānvayaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:578: iha tu kraya eva sarvakarmakaraṇāvacchinnaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP28prakp11u:579: tena krīṇātītyetadeva1171 pradhānaṃ padam, tadanvayitā ca sarveṣāmāruṇyādīnāmiti /
GSP28prakp11u:601: idaṃ vivakṣitam, idavivakṣitamityādi na sampradhāryate, tāvanna kvacidvedavākyārtho 'vabuddhyate /
GSP28prakp11u:624: yaccedaṃ sarvapadānāmanvitābhidhāyitvamucyate, tat sarveṣu śrautārtheṣu padeṣu /
GSP28prakp11u:625: lākṣaṇika-gauṇārthapadaprayoge tu yadeva tatra śrautārtha padam tadevānvitābhidhāyakam,
GSP28prakp11u:630: tenānvitaṃ śrautārthameva padaṃ svārthamabhidhatta iti darśanarahasyamidam /
GSP28prakp11u:631: na ca sarvapadānyeva lākṣaṇikāni, gauṇāni vā vākye sambhavantīti niravadyam /
GSP28prakp11u:635: kathaṃ punaranvitābhidhāyināṃ padena svarūpamātraṃ smārayituṃ śakyamityāha---
GSP28prakp11u:642: na hi yatpramāṇaṃ, tadeva smaraṇakāraṇam, apramāṇameva hi tat /
GSP28prakp11u:643: yasya tu yena saha kadācitpratyāsattiḥ pratītapūrvā,
GSP28prakp11u:644: sa tatra saṃskārodbodhaddhāreṇa śaknotyeva smṛtiṃ janayitum /
GSP28prakp11u:645: asti ca svarūpasyāpi tadabhidheyāntargatyā śabdena pratyāsattiriti,
GSP28prakp11u:653: “sarvasyānupalabdher'the prāmāṇyaṃ smṛtiranyathā” [ślo. vā. au. sū ślo. 11.] iti /
GSP28prakp11u:656: tadā pramāṇa-smṛti-saṃśaya-viparyayebhyaḥ pratipattyantarānabhyupagamāt padāt padārthapratītiḥ kvāntarbhāvyatāmiti vācyam /
GSP28prakp11u:676: tathā pacatyartho 'pi piṣṭakādikaraṇako 'vagata1180 iti tatsmaraṇānnaudanānvita evābhidhīyeta /
GSP28prakp11u:685: atha śabdairbahavor'thāssmāryante, kintu teṣāṃ katamenānvayāvabodhakatvamiti na vidmaḥ1184 /
GSP28prakp11u:696: tathāpi śabde tathā nā'śrīyate, kintu vācakatvāvagamādeva vācakatvam /
GSP28prakp11u:701: tatrāpi sannidhāpakavaśena viśeṣānvitābhidhānalābha iti lokata eva jñātamiti, na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:702: api ca jñātaṃ tāvadetad yadanena padenāyamartho 'nvito vācya iti,
GSP28prakp11u:707: “sambhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedastu neṣyate” [ślo. vā. pra. sū. ślo. 9.] iti /
GSP28prakp11u:709: loke ca lakṣaṇā, gauṇī ca vṛttirvākyabhedabhayādeva1187 /
GSP28prakp11u:710: anyathā vākyaṃ bhitvā kimityadhyāhṛtya yogyamarthāntaraṃ sarvapadānyeva mukhyārthāni nā'śrīyante /
GSP28prakp11u:714: citrādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 1. 4. 2.] rūḍhiparityāgena “pañcadaśānyājyāni bhavantī” [tāṃ . vrā. 20. 1. 1.] tikathañcinnāmadheyatvāśrayaṇam /
GSP28prakp11u:720: arddhaṃ bahirvedī” [mai. saṃ. 3. 9. 4.] tyatra [mī. da. 3. 7. 6.] deśalakṣaṇāparatvam /
GSP28prakp11u:723: “vāruṇyā niṣkāsena tuṣaiścāvabhṛthaṃ yantī” [mī. da. 7. 3. 5.] tyatra nirapekṣatvatyāgaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:724: paryudāsādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 10. 8. 7.] ca nañarthasya lākṣaṇikatvamityāda bahutaraṃ dṛśyate /
GSP28prakp11u:731: vṛddhavyavahāracyutpattiniyantritāyāṃ śabdārthāvagatau ye nyāyāḥ vṛddhavyavahāre vākyārthāvagatihetutayā viditāḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:734: svayaṃ smāritena ca tadekavākyatvānuguṇenār'thāntareṇāpi kimityanvitābhidhānaṃ na bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:736: atha nopaśāntā'kāṅkṣā, tarhi ko nāma tatrānvitābhidhānaṃ vārayet /
GSP28prakp11u:737: ata evaikapadoccāraṇe tadarthasambandhamukhena bahuṣvapi smṛtisannihiteṣuyasyār'thasya kenacitprakāreṇa viśeṣo gṛhyate,
GSP28prakp11u:740: ata eva vikṛtiṣu tatsādṛśyena yadapūrvaṃ smaryamāṇaṃ svopakārakaṃ smārayati,
GSP28prakp11u:744: darvihomeṣu tu sarvāpūrvāṇāmaviśeṣād viśeṣo grahītumaśakya ityanadhyavasāya eva prākṛtasyopakārasyaeti,
GSP28prakp11u:747: tatra tadeva padena anapabhraṣṭasambandhagrahaṇasaṃskārasya puruṣasya niyamena smāryate,
GSP28prakp11u:749: sarvaṃ padaṃ svārthaṃ hi niyamena sambandhagrahaṇāt1196 smārayati, nār'thāntaram /
GSP28prakp11u:776: taṃ vinā tadasambhavāditi, nāparā tadviṣayā padānāṃ śaktiḥ kalpanīyā // 16 //
GSP28prakp11u:781: so 'nvayāpratītau na pratīta eva syāt, kintu svarūpamātrameva /
GSP28prakp11u:787: vyaktimattaiva jātisvarūpaṃ na bhavati, kintu vyakterākārāntarabhūtā jātistato bhinnā /
GSP28prakp11u:790: kintvākārabhūtā jātirvyaktervyatiriktāpi vastusvabhāvena vyaktimantareṇa na pratītimanubhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:791: etāvatā ca sāmyena dṛṣṭāntaḥ, na sarvātmanā /
GSP28prakp11u:806: cihnābhāvena ca kriyānvayāsambhavādākṛtiviṣayatve śabdavyāpāra iti niścīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:807: tenā'kṛtirna vyaktiṃ gamayati, kintu śabda eva tadabhidhāyakatayetyākṛtito vyaktirucyate /
GSP28prakp11u:809: tena vyatiṣaktābhidhānavanna vyatiṣaṅgābhidhānaṃ, niṣkṛṣṭāmidhānantu na bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:813: loke ca padārthānāṃ sambandhagrahaṇasamaya eva viditatvāt,
GSP28prakp11u:823: kriyāpadaṃ hi kārakasāmānyāvyabhicāriṇyā kriyayā sahānvaya---vyatirekau bhajate /
GSP28prakp11u:841: atha viśeṣamātrākṣepe 'pyākāṅkṣitassannihito yogyaśca yogaviśeṣo yaḥ padāntareṇa samarpyate, sa eva gṛhyate /
GSP28prakp11u:845: sāmānyānvitābhidhānavādino mate padāni tāvat tanmātra eva paryavasitaśaktīni,
GSP28prakp11u:848: tenā'kāṅkṣite yogye ca viśeṣe padāntareṇa1213 sannidhāpite 'pi,
GSP28prakp11u:851: viśeṣānvayavādinastu mate sambandhagrahaṇaṃ pratyupādhitvena praviṣṭāni tāni 1214vākyārthapratipattāvupayujyante // 20 //
GSP28prakp11u:855: padānāṃ padārthāntarasambaddhassvārtho bodhya ityasyāṃ vyupattāvupādhitvena yogyatvādikamanupraviṣṭaṃ1215 viśeṣānvitābhidhānavādipakṣe upakārakam,
GSP28prakp11u:863: vākyamekaṃ na nirbhāgra vākyāntyo varṇa eva vā /
GSP28prakp11u:864: padavṛndaṃ smṛtisthaṃ vā prathamaṃ padameva vā //
GSP28prakp11u:875: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīmacchālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ savṛttikāyā vākyārthamātrṛkāyā upoddhāto nāma prathamaḥ paricchedassamāptaḥ //
GSP28prakp11u:882: apūrvaṃ kāryaṃ vedavākyānāmartha iti sādhayitukāmaḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ tāvadāha---
GSP28prakp11u:888: viśiṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena hi tadviṣayā śabdaśaktiranumīyate, tadeva ca sambandhagrahaṇam /
GSP28prakp11u:889: yacca na pratīyate, na tadviṣayo vyavahāro 'vasīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:893: na ca śabdādeva tadavagamya, sambandhāvadhāraṇam, itaretarāśrayaprasaṅgāt1219 /
GSP28prakp11u:906: tasmādagṛhītasambandho liṅādiḥ kathamapūrvaṃ kāryamabhidhatte, tathā ca kathaṃ 1221tadvākyārthaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:922: punaśca tasyāyaṃ vimarśo jāyate---ahaṃ buddhvā pravṛtto1226 yathā, tadvadeṣo 'pi /
GSP28prakp11u:930: tathā-vṛddhasya pravṛttihetubhūtā buddhiḥ---dharmiṇī yadviṣayā buddhirmama pravṛttihetubhūtā tadviṣayaivāsyāpīti---sādhyo dharmaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:934: anena mama mānāntareṇa tu yadviṣayā sā buddhiḥ pravṛttihetubhūtā,
GSP28prakp11u:936: tadbhāve satyavagamāt, mama tu mānāntareṇa tad bodhyata iti---ayamāvayorviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:943: tatra buddhvā pravṛtto 'haṃ kiṃ tāvat svayamanyadā // 4 //
GSP28prakp11u:944: śabdanirapekṣassvayamahaṃ pravarttamānaḥ kiṃ buddhvā pravṛtta iti jijñāsate /
GSP28prakp11u:949: 1230tena śabda eva pravṛttihetubhūto vidhiḥ, tadvyāpāro veti nirastaṃ bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:952: tathāhi---liṅādiśabdasvarūpasya pravartakatve sarva eva tacchāviṇo niyamena pravartteran,
GSP28prakp11u:956: piśitacakṣuṣo mānuṣā vayaṃ neyatīṃ pramāṇabhūmimavagāhituṃ kṣamāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:967: tasyāśca puruṣavyāpārarūpā svargādibhāvyāvacchinnā bhāvārthakaraṇikā śrauta-smārttā-cāraprāptapadārthajanitakaraṇopakāravatyārthabhāvanā samānapratyayavācyā viṣayabhūtā---iti /
GSP28prakp11u:970: liṅādestādṛśo vyāpāro vidyata ityatra na kiñcana pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp11u:977: atha liṅādiśabda eva pramāṇamiti sāhasam, agṛhītasambandhasyāvācakatvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:979: prprkathañca tatra svādhyāyādhyayanavidhinā sarve vidhāyakāssvātmā ca viniyujyante /
GSP28prakp11u:981: yaśca yena oṃpreryate, sa tena niyujyate /
GSP28prakp11u:984: tadapyanupapannam---śābdabhāvanāsu sarvaśabdānāṃ svata eva kartṛtvāt viniyogānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP28prakp11u:985: atha na apuruṣāḥ preraṇe viniyujyante, kintvarthāvabodhane /
GSP28prakp11u:993: svādhyāyāṃ hi sphuṭaṃ karma sākṣātsaṃskriyate ci saḥ” //
GSP28prakp11u:995: saṃskāravidhiśca na saṃskāryaṃ viniyuṅkte, pramāṇāntarāvasitopayogasya śeṣitvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:996: saṃskāraparyavasāyī tu saṃskāravidhirna saṃskāryasya kāryaṃ kalpayet /
GSP28prakp11u:997: ātmā cādhyayanavidhinā viniyujyate, na viniyujyate veti pratipattidvayasyāpyasambhavādanupapannam /
GSP28prakp11u:1013: na ca preraṇotpattau śabdakartṛkāyāṃ karaṇībhūtajñānānugrahayogyatā tasya śakyate 'vagantuṃ /
GSP28prakp11u:1014: purūṣakartṛkāyāntu pravṛttau syāt tasya yogyatāvagamaḥ, praśaste 1235puruṣapravṛttidarśanāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1018: na phalasambhavāyattā kriyāniṣpattiḥ, kriyāniṣpattyāyattaiva tu phalasiddhiriti loke pratītam /
GSP28prakp11u:1019: ata eva tasminpakṣe niṣphale 'pi preraṇāsiddheḥ pravṛttissyāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1020: atha phalamapītikarttavyatāpadaniveśi, prāśastyavat, atastadabhāve na preraṇā niṣpadyate---iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1022: satyametad, asti tāvad tadapīti na tyajyeta /
GSP28prakp11u:1023: evaṃ tarhyaśrute prāśastye tadapekṣā mā bhūt /
GSP28prakp11u:1028: atha śabdaḥ preraṇāṃ karotyeva, pravṛttistu na tāvanmātreṇa, kintu tajjñāne sati /
GSP28prakp11u:1029: evaṃ tarhi jñānaphalameva pravṛttirastu, na preraṇāphalaṃ, tasminsati bhāvāt, asati cābhāvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1030: tathā ca na śābdabhāvanā vidhiriti siddham /
GSP28prakp11u:1036: saṃyogajasya ca dravyatve sati śabdasya nabhasā sahāsambhavāt tasya ca traividhyaniyamāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1043: parasthe 'pi vyāpāre bhavatyeva kartṛtā, parispanda ivātmana iti, na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1060: kiṃ kariṣyati, pakṣyati,iti praśnottaradarśanāt, karotyarthassarvākhyātairabhidhīyata iti gamyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1073: anavagate hi dhātuvācye vyāpāraviśeṣe, tadviśeṣa eva-evaṃpṛcchyate, tatra pacatītyuttaram /
GSP28prakp11u:1075: sarve dhātvarthāśca kasyacidabhūtasya bhavane 'nukūlatāṃ bhajantaḥ karotyarthatāmāpannāḥ karotinā praṣṭum,
GSP28prakp11u:1080: api ca saprayatnakriyeṣu devattādiṣu vyāpārabhedasambhavāt ghaṭetāṃ praśnottare /
GSP28prakp11u:1093: nāpi dvayoḥ, utpatya-nipatite śyene sthāṇau prayogaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1099: praśnottare tu sambandhajñānottarakālabhāvinī, ato na tadvaśena sambandhinirūpaṇā /
GSP28prakp11u:1101: api ca “pākaṃ karoti devadattaḥ” ityatra tāvatpacyarthaṃ pākaśabdo bravīti,
GSP28prakp11u:1115: yastu---“devadatta odanaṃ pacatī“tyādau vṛddhavyavahāre eva prakṛtyarthātirikte prayatne prayogādāravyātānāṃ tadarthatāmāha /
GSP28prakp11u:1121: nanu prābhākarā api bhāvanāvācakatāṃ na kathamāravyātapratyayasyecchanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1123: kintu kāryābhidhāyino liṅādayaḥ kāryasyānyathānabhidhānāt kṛtyabhidhāyina iṣyante /
GSP28prakp11u:1124: kṛtisambandhi hi kāryaṃ kṛtyanabhidhāne nābhihitaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1132: asti ca tatra prakṛtibhūto daṇḍaśabdaḥ, sa ca tasya pratyāyayitā /
GSP28prakp11u:1135: na cāsau parakṛtisambandhi svayaṃ kāryaṃ boddhumalamiti, tadīyakṛtyabhidhānameṣitavyam /
GSP28prakp11u:1137: na ca sarvathā 1245tadananubhave tadabhidhāyina iti, na daṇḍinyāyasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1139: yathā liṅa kartrādisaṃkhyāmātravacanatā, kriyākṣepeṇa ca kartrādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1140: tathehāpi kriyā prayatnamākṣipati, mā bhūttasya liṅvācyatā--iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1151: tatra na kriyāmatraṃ tāvadahaṃ budhvā pravṛttaḥ, nāpi phalamātram, na kriyāphalasambandhamātraṃ vā /
GSP28prakp11u:1157: kintu kāryatāṃ budhvā pravṛtto 'ham, mamedaṃ kāryathmati pratītya---ahaṃ sarvatra pravṛttaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1166: iṣṭasādhanataiva tu kāryatā, na parā kācit, saiva pravṛttiheturvidhirucyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1181: atītasya 1253vartamānasya ceṣṭasādhanatā'sti, na ca tat kāryatayā'vasīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1183: tathā pravṛttirapi tanmātrāvagamāyattā na bhavatītyupekṣyaiva tāvat taṃ,
GSP28prakp11u:1185: 1254phalasādhanatā nāma yā sā naiva ca kāryatā /
GSP28prakp11u:1193: kintu svayaṃ kleśarūpaṃ karma yatkāryatāṃ vrajet // 8 //
GSP28prakp11u:1199: kintu kṛtiṃ prati pradhānabhūtaṃ sat yat tadadhīnasattākam, tatkāryamucyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1200: tacca kṛteḥ pradhānam, yadadhikṛtya kṛtiḥ pravartate /
GSP28prakp11u:1201: na ca duḥkhaṃ dukhahetuṃvādhikṛtyakṛteḥ pravṛttirupapannā, nāpyaduḥkham, aduḥkhahetuṃ vā /
GSP28prakp11u:1205: na tasya kṛtiṃ prati prādhānyāvagamo1257 ghaṭate /
GSP28prakp11u:1210: sukhaṃ hi sarvaḥ kāryatayāvaiti, na tasya phalasādhanatāmapekṣate /
GSP28prakp11u:1218: icchā yadyapi pravṛttihetuḥ, tathāpi sā liṅādivācyā na bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1229: ta eva kāryāvagatiṃ kurvantīti śabdāntaravalliṅādīnāṃ kāryavācakatvavyutpattisiddhiḥ // 10 //
GSP28prakp11u:1230: nanu lokavyavahārāt liṅādayo vācakatayā vyutpādyamānāṃ praiṣādiṣvevavacakatayā vyutpattimarhanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1235: pravarttyapuruṣāpekṣayā jyāyasā vaktrā pratipādyamānaṃ kāryaṃ praiṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1248: vastutastu praiṣādīnāmapi 1267pravṛttyavyabhicāritvātkāryasya ca pravṛttiṣu sarvāsu hetubhūtatvātpraiṣādiṣvapi liṅādīnāṃ kāryamevār'tha iti niścīyate // 12 //
GSP28prakp11u:1253: kṛtau satyāṃ bhāvāt, asatyāñcābhāvādanumānataḥ kṛtisādhyatā tāvadavagamyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1254: yadadhitkṛtya kṛtiḥ pravarttate, tatkṛteḥ pradhānam, prayatnaśca kṛtiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1255: sa ca mānasapratyakṣavedya iti, viśiṣṭaprayojanatāpi prayatnasya pratyakṣavedyaiva /
GSP28prakp11u:1267: loke hi liṅādiyuktavākyaśravaṇe viśiṣṭakriyānuṣṭhānadarśanāttadviṣayā kāryāvagatirliṅādibhiḥ kriyata iti yuktam,
GSP28prakp11u:1273: liṅādiśravaṇe tu tathābhūtārthaṃparatayā1272 dhātuḥ prayukta ityavagamya,
GSP28prakp11u:1287: tena yadyapi lokānusāreṇa kriyāyā eva kāryatayā bodhyamānāyā vākyārthatvāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1297: tena tatsambandhātsādhyabhūtaṃ svargādi kāmyamānatayā puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi---
GSP28prakp11u:1306: na ca tasya sarvasya sādhanaṃ bhavati, sarvajñatvamapi kecitkāmayante, na ca tasyopāyasambhavaḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1309: dṛśyante hi grāmābhigamanakāmā 1280api yādṛcchikīṣu kriyāsu pravarttamānāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1315: anyathā hi tatkāminā satā tatkāryatayānavabuddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1333: na ca teṣu svarūpanibandhana eva tatprayogaḥ, prītyapagame tadabhāvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1334: na ca tatsādhanavacanatā tadanabhidhāne ghaṭate, tadabhidhānābhyūpagame tadvācakataiva /
GSP28prakp11u:1344: tadānuguṇyena tādaśyāmeva prītau svargaśabdaḥ prayukta iti niścītate /
GSP28prakp11u:1346: ato na karmānantarabhāvinīti, na tatra karmaṇa āśutaravināśinassādhanatāvakalpate /
GSP28prakp11u:1347: yasmin hi pūrvavarttini yanniṣpādyate, tattasya sādhanamitilokapratītiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1348: ata eva ca vinaṣṭasyāpi karmaṇaśśāstreṇa sādhanatvaṃ bodhata iti ye bruvate, te 'pi nirastāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1349: evaṃ cāsāvāśutaravināśinī kriyā svargakāminā niyojyena saha kāryatayā sambandhuṃ nār'hati,
GSP28prakp11u:1355: tena tasyā api niyojyasaṃbandho ghaṭata eva /
GSP28prakp11u:1365: śaktimati cātīte śaktirapyatīteti pramāṇāntarasiddhamiti, na sāpi sthāyinī śakyā kalpayitum /
GSP28prakp11u:1370: śakmimaddhi sādhanam, na śaktiḥ kevalā1292, anyathā śaktitvaṃ na syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1371: devatāprasādasya phalaprayojakatvaśaṅkā 1293nanu yāgādikriyā devatārādhanopāyabhūtā satī kāryatayocyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1379: na hi devatārādhanopāyabhūto yāga ityatra kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp11u:1386: na ca pramāṇāntareṇa devatāsādhanopāyatā ayāgasyāvagamyata ityuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1395: devatādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] ca prapañcenāyamartho nirasta iti, nātīvātra yatitavyam /
GSP28prakp11u:1402: śabdato vā puruṣasaṃskārahetutā yāgādīnāmavasīyata iti “karmāṇyārambhabhāvyatvādi” [mī. da. a. 11. pā. 1 sū. 20] tyatroktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1404: nanu kriyaiva kāryatayocyatām, phalasādhanatā ca tasyā evā'śrīyatām /
GSP28prakp11u:1405: tadanyathānupapattyā tu kiñcidapyaparaṃ tañjanyaṃ phalodayānuguṇaṃ kālāntarasthāyyātmāśrayaṃ parikalpyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1409: na ca kriyājanyenānyena phalajanakena kalpitena kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatopapāditā bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1410: na hi sādhanasādhanaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1413: vyāpārayogitayaiva śaktimatāṃ sādhanatā yataḥna cā'tmasamavāyyarthāntaraṃ karmaṇāmavāntaravyāpāraḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1421: ṣaṣṭhādye tasyaiva kāryasya svasambandhitayā bodhyassvargakāmādirniyojya iti vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1423: tasya ca kāryasya niyojyaviśeṣaṇībhūtakāmyotpattihetutvamiti bādaryadhikaraṇe [mī. da. 3. 1. 3] rāddhāntitam /
GSP28prakp11u:1424: tacca tathābhūtaṃ kāryaṃ kriyārūpaṃ na bhavati, tasyāḥ phalasādhanatvāyogāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1425: devatārādhanamukhena tāvat phalasādhanatā nāstīti devatādhikaraṇai [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1427: karmaṇaḥ, tacktervā sthāyitā neti cāpūrvādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 2. 1. 2.] pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1428: ato niyojyānvayamukhena mānāntarāpūrvamātmasamavāyi kāryaṃ liṅādibhirabhidhayata ityanekanyāyasādhyam /
GSP28prakp11u:1440: na kriyādibhinnaṃ kāryamiti yo manyate, taṃ pratyāha---
GSP28prakp11u:1476: tacca prayojanākaṅkṣitayā prayojanībhūtena sādhikāreṇa niyogenānvīyata iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1484: yo 'sau liṅādiḥ prāganūdyamānārthakatayā śaṅkitaḥ, sa idānīṃ niyogāntaramabhidhatte /
GSP28prakp11u:1516: viṣayānuṣṭhitau satyāṃ siddho na hi vidhiḥ phalam /
GSP28prakp11u:1539: nanvevaṃ bhavatu kābhyeṣvapūrvakāryābhidhānaṃ liṅādīnām, nitya-naimittikaniṣedhādhikāreṣu katham ?
GSP28prakp11u:1551: anyathā yadi kaścitkalpite phale na pravartate, tadā kiṃ karttavyam // 30 //
GSP28prakp11u:1557: tena kāmādhikāre siddhe 'pūrvakāryābhidhāyakatve, nityādiṣvapi sa evār'tho virodhābhāvādāśrīyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1560: tatraitadeva tāvadvaktavyam---na kevalaṃ vede lokavyavahārādeva śabdārthāvadhāraṇam,
GSP28prakp11u:1563: etacca yavavarāhādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 1. 3. 5.] vyutpāditam 1329vyavahārata eva sambandhāvadhāraṇādubhayathāpi padāntarārthādhyavasānaṃ bhavatyeva,
GSP28prakp11u:1585: sitetara iva tveṣa pakṣaścittaṃ na karṣati /
GSP28prakp11u:1609: kāryamātrārthatve kriyaiva kāryatayā liṅādyartha iti niścīyate,
GSP28prakp11u:1614: tadā tasyāssvayaṃ duḥkharūpatvātpuruṣārthāntarānubandhanaṃ vina pravṛttyasambhavānniyamena sukhārthinaḥ pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1622: phalaṃ vinā ca tadanupapatteḥ phalāvagamamapi sambhāvayet /
GSP28prakp11u:1624: sa eva vālyadaśāyāṃ vyutpannassvayamācāryapadavīmadhiruḍho vedārthaṃ pratītya,
GSP28prakp11u:1632: sarvathaiva1341 yato loke kriyā kāryaiva gamyate // 40 //
GSP28prakp11u:1639: apūrvaṃ hi kriyāsādhyaṃ sādhitā sādhanaṃ kriyā /
GSP28prakp11u:1643: pratipatti-prayogau hi nāvaśyaṃ śrautavṛttyanusāriṇāveva, lakṣaṇayāpi loke1344 taddarśanāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1647: yattu śrautapadārthe kārye loke liṅādi na prayujyata iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1650: sādhitā ca satī kriyā sādhanaṃ bhavatītyapūrveṇa saha kriyākāryatvaṃ1345 nityasambaddhamiti,
GSP28prakp11u:1652: yadyeṣā1346 lakṣaṇā, kimiti tarhi loko nāvagacchatītyāha---
GSP28prakp11u:1655: mukhyamarthamaviditvā lākṣaṇikamapyarthaṃ śrautamiva manyante, mlecchā iva yava-varāhādyartham /
